abstractText: An illuminated Nepalese paper manuscript containing a Dhāraṇīs and Stotras Collection that consists of the Cakrasaṃvarahṛdayadhāraṇī, the Tārādevīstotra, the Tathāgatavyāptākavaca, the Ārymahākālatantradhāraṇī and the Caṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantradhāraṇī..
abstractShort: An illuminated Nepalese paper manuscript containing a Dhāraṇīs and Stotras Collection that consists of the Cakrasaṃvarahṛdayadhāraṇī,
title: Dhāraṇīs and Stotras Collection
